ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 111 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 111 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: - Highly recommend writing an independent essay because it provides a lot more freedom and flexibility than writing it in a seminar

I would absolutely recommend completing your senior essay as an independent study as opposed to in a seminar. By far, everyone I knew writing independently got far more out of their senior essay experience than our peers in seminars. Take advantage of the opportunity to deeply explore a topic you care about. Your undergraduate career will be over soon, and you're going to want something to show for it.
Definitely make this an independent project -- it's really fulfilling to work on something independently.
Both stressful and rewarding. In my opinion, worth it, but make sure there's something you care enough about to write 50 pages on.
